metadata.description: The entire series of 100 Girls filled with lots of extras. Sylvia Mark is a thirteen year-old girl who feels separated from her peers, but Sylvia doesn't know is that she's just one of one hundred girls bred as part of a genetics experiment that sought to give normal humans extraordinary powers. Thirteen years ago, four girls were kidnapped and sent to families around the country to be raised and Sylvia is determined to find out why...
metadata.name: 100 Girls
